APRIL 30, 2020
Dear Rescue Families,

We trust this message finds you well and also enjoying this beautiful weather.

We know that the Governor has suggested that public schools may start the next school year as early as July, but we would like to clarify that there have been no directives from the State regarding start dates. Rescue Union's 2020-2021 school year calendar is posted on the District website and the first student day of school will be Tuesday, August 11. We are not considering changing our start date unless the Governor mandates a change. All El Dorado County districts are maintaining their August start dates.

We will continue communicating with you as we learn new information. We thank you for your support and partnership.

Most sincerely,
Cheryl Olson, Superintendent

Most sincerely,

Cheryl Olson, Superintendent
